website_summaries.verdict: A little thinner than more expensive options, but it's plenty durable for casual backyard fun.
pros: Center mesh helps coordinate ball games
cons: Thinner material and fewer handles than other parachutes this size

customer_reviews.title: parachute fun
customer_reviews.text: As an elementary school music teacher I need things that are cheap and durable- and so far this fits the bill. I had bought a 6 foot one which was WAY too small. This was a great replacement. It's been tugged and pulled quite a bit and so far so good. It would be great fun for kids to have to play with in the backyard or playground too. It's not as heavy duty as those that PE teachers use but it's good quality and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: jbenson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice so far. The kids really liked it. It's a bit more stiff material than I thought, but it works. It's more like tent material than parachute material. It seems well built though. Folds easy. If any things goes wrong with it I'll come back and add those comments. If you have fewer kids I'd get a smaller size, but this should be good for 8-12 children, or 4 - 8 adults.
customer_reviews.author: D and J

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline cover
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a trampoline cover, works great. Still in great condition after being out in the Arizona heat and sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: E Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12 foot. This is a good size for small kids. I would say 8 and under. My kid is 9 and she can use it with 4 friends but more than that gets chaotic. And I want to use it too! I would suggest the 20 foot size if it is for older kids or if adults want to participate.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend the larger one if adults want to play with the kids.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift, I remember this when I was a child in gym class. I thought it would be great for the summer with the kids. It's a bit thinner than the one they have in school, but decently sized. I got the 12 foot one for adults and children.
customer_reviews.author: Abby's Advice

customer_reviews.title: Poor handles
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Magicfly had reached out to me due to my poor review. They offered to send me a new parachute. This one seems to be in much better condition. Excellent customer service. I would definitely order this again. Thanks Magicfly. I purchased this for my 9 year old nieces birthday. She has 3 younger siblings and I thought it would be a fun gift. Immediately 4 of the handles broke. So disappointed. My sister in law is going to sew the handles back on so the kids can continue to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might last a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.text: So I read reviews and it says it looked like sturdy material. I disagree. This is not near as good of material as the ones we had in school. The stitching looks a little loose and if the kids I bought this for were any older I would have sent this back. 3 & 5 are the ages of the kids I bought this for. Also I would have bought a bigger one if the kids were any older.
customer_reviews.author: Hook

customer_reviews.title: Crinkly fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is different from the other 2 parachutes I own. It is thin and crinkly like a plastic type of polyester, not a soft flowy polyester. It is NOISY when kids are moving it. If you are doing movement to music, it's hard to hear the music over all the fabric noise.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is really durable e for the price! Beautiful colors! Ive had an expensive one and this is a bit thinner but is durable enough. Cant beat this item for the price! Comes in a great bag and has a little sheet with game ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Update: magicfly sent me a free replacement and or seems to be better quality. My kids play with it all the time. Great product for the price. Very thin. Ripped same day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Roundy

customer_reviews.title: INFURIATING AMAZON EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine, but too small. Returned and they said they issued a refund (and they didn't). so no tarp. no money. VERY displeased
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: great so far, using for trampoline roof, but wish there was a way to lift it up from the center. The hole in center is mesh, excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Dylan P. Wint

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: The parachute seems very sturdy. I will be taking these overseas as gifts for the orphans that I visit in December. I know the children will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie033

customer_reviews.title: It's not the greatest but it's good enough.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't feel quite like the ones they use at schools but it serves its purpose. The price was pretty cheap so I think that reflects a bit on the material. Still fun for the kids and they don't seem to notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Behan

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great multi use toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it but decided to use it to turn their gazebo into a Arabian Nights house w the parachute suspended from the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Elise C

customer_reviews.title: The grandchildren were excited to play with this but 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren were excited to play with this but 2 of the handles broke the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: amy manges

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was fun for an hour but two handles ripped off straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Clyne Painter

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved this
customer_reviews.text: and it's big enough for a small group of kids, but works with 3, or 2 and an adult. It is parachute material and bigger than I thought it would be. I was pleased when I took it out and we used it outdoors for at home recess. Great for PE in virtual home learning.
customer_reviews.author: Dana LaPointe

customer_reviews.title: very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am in a homeschool preschool with my 4 year old and all the kids love it! this one is a little cheaper quality than the nice ones you find in gym classes but for the price is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MaliS

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great quality. Bought this for a 5 year old and he loved it!! Even the teenagers were having a great time playing with this! Great gift for any child
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun. Sturdy and good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday party. Hours of fun. Sturdy and good price. Works fine
customer_reviews.author: lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Zen

customer_reviews.title: Education is Fun...damental
customer_reviews.text: I love the parachute. I used it for my preschool. We are using it to learn colors, how to follow directions, counting, team building, and how to take turns. Plus have fun while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Azoleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for little kids. It’s so big though, I should have ordered a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Anel Lestage

customer_reviews.title: This is a great parachute!
customer_reviews.text: This parachute is a classic game for kids at parties or picnics. It seems to be durable and not difficult to get back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Klt163

customer_reviews.title: NOT parachute material - very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Much, much more fragile than expected, but my two toddlers love it. Hoping it will last long enough for them to grow into playing with it properly.
customer_reviews.author: JAMommy

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I remember these from elementary school. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great for special needa
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this! The colors are great! She is autistic and it is great for motor skills
customer_reviews.author: Grams325

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, use it as a tent over our climbing dome as well to make a fort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best used with 8 children
customer_reviews.text: not very big, best used with 8 children, kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Natsright

customer_reviews.title: but my kids LOVE it. Very fun and colorful
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I expected, but my kids LOVE it. Very fun and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Easily packable.
customer_reviews.text: One to five year olds liked playing with the parachute. Easy to create your own games.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My son has so much fun and it’s a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Clevetta

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: It not worth your energy. I'm very unsatisfied with the service. They are worthless. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rocha Neal

customer_reviews.title: Making memories!
customer_reviews.text: great parachute. will be perfect at my grandson<s party. My son remembered it being one of his favorites in PE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flying high :-)
customer_reviews.text: It is a great toy for the kids. We use it for VBS and the kids can barely wait for there turn to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: RedHot2015

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality , stiching was off place and colors faded
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun but I thought that the parachute would actually be ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun but I thought that the parachute would actually be a little bit thicker the kids had a great time with it though
customer_reviews.author: J Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it the kids love it. I can be more happier.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely and the kids had great fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Most colorful durable product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift wrapping idea from a video review to cover the Jungle Gym I got for my grandsons Birthday! They loved both but the tent idea kicked it out of the park if you love the surprise affect like I do!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Magicfly Kids Parachute,12 Foot Play Parachute with 8 Handles, Rainbow Parachute for Playground, Cooperative Games, Good for 8 Kids Play
feature_bullets: Magicfly 12 Feet(3.5M) Diameter play parachute toy, with bright color and lovely octagonal shape.
Designed with 8 handles, which ensure easier grabbing for kids when playing games.
Made of eco-friendly and durable non-toxic 100% Polyester material, both rot-proof and Waterproof.
Help training kids's team work ability, visual development, major movement and fine movement.
Recommended Using Places: Preschool, kindergarten, school, garden shopping mall, courtyard etc.
